info.title: Credential Service API for cheqd network
info.description: API service to create and manage DIDs, Verifiable Credentials, and DID-Linked Resources

post.description: This endpoint issues a credential. As input it takes the list of attributes, subjectDid, context and expiration date of the credential to be issued.

400.description: A problem with the input fields has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

500.description: An internal error has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

post.description: This endpoint verifies the credential. As input it takes the entire credential itself or just the JWT string.

400.description: A problem with the input fields has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

500.description: An internal error has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

post.description: This endpoint verifies the credential. As input it takes the entire credential itself or just the JWT string.

400.description: A problem with the input fields has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

500.description: An internal error has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

post.description: This endpoint suspends the credential. As input it takes the entire credential itself.

400.description: A problem with the input fields has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

500.description: An internal error has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

post.description: This endpoint reinstates the credential. As input it takes the entire credential itself.

400.description: A problem with the input fields has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

500.description: An internal error has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

post.description: This endpoint verifies the credential presentation. As input it takes the entire presentation itself.

400.description: A problem with the input fields has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

500.description: An internal error has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

post.description: This endpoint verifies the JWT token and creates a customer if they don't exist.

400.description: A problem with the input fields has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

500.description: An internal error has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

get.description: This endpoint verifies the JWT token and returns the customer if it exists.

post.description: This endpoint creates a DID by taking a set of input parameters or the whole didDocument itself.

400.description: A problem with the input fields has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

500.description: An internal error has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

post.description: This endpoint updates a DID by taking DID document or the particular fields needed to be updated.

400.description: A problem with the input fields has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

500.description: An internal error has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

post.description: This endpoint deactivates a DID by taking DID document or a verification method as an input.

500.description: An internal error has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

get.description: This endpoint returns the list of DIDs controlled by the account.

get.summary: Fetch statusList's published by a DID.

400.description: A problem with the input fields has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

500.description: An internal error has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

400.description: A problem with the input fields has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

500.description: An internal error has occurred. Additional state information plus metadata may be available in the response body.

CredentialRequest.description: Input fields for the create operation.

issuerDid.description: This input field is the Issuer's DID.

subjectDid.description: This input field is the holder's DID.

@context.description: Additional contexts to be included in the credential.

type.description: Additional type property to be included in the credential.

expirationDate.description: Optional expiration date according to the specification.

format.description: Select one of the supported credential formats, jwt by default.

credentialStatus.description: Optional field to support revocation or suspension, which takes statusListName and statusListPurpose as inputs.

Credential.description: Input fields for the update operation.

credential.description: This input field takes the credential object or the JWT string
This input field takes the credential object or the JWT string.\

presentation.description: This input field takes the presentation object or the JWT string.

did.description: The DID of the status list publisher.

statusListName.description: The name of the status list to be created.

length.description: The length of the status list to be created. The default and minimum length is 140000 which is 16kb.

encoding.description: The encoding format of the statusList to be published.

statusListVersion.description: This input field is OPTIONAL, If present assigns the version to be assigned to the statusList.

alsoKnownAs.description: The input field is OPTIONAL. If present, the value MUST be a set where each item in the set is a uri.

did.description: The DID of the status list publisher.

statusListName.description: The name of the statusList to be published

encodedList.description: The encoding format of the statusList provided

statusListVersion.description: This input field is OPTIONAL, If present assigns the version to be assigned to the statusList

alsoKnownAs.description: The input field is OPTIONAL. If present, the value MUST be a set where each item in the set is a uri.

did.description: The DID of the status list publisher.

statusListName.description: The name of the status list to be created.

indices.description: Provide the list of indices to be updated.

statusListVersion.description: The input field is OPTIONAL, If present uses the provided statusListVersion for the update operation.

DidDocument.description: This input field contains either a complete DID document, or an incremental change (diff) to a DID document. See https://identity.foundation/did-registration/#diddocument.

assertionMethod.description: An assertion method is required to issue JSONLD credentials.

service.description: This input field assigns the provided service array to the DID Document.

verificationMethod.description: This input field assigns the provided verificationMethod array to the DID Document.

authentication.description: This input field assigns the provided authentication array to the DID Document.

CreateResourceRequest.description: Input fields for the resource creation

data.description: Provide encoded string for the resource data.

encoding.description: The encoding format of the resource data.

UnauthorizedError.description: Access token is missing or invalid
